newsitem.title: USA: Falcon Building sees higher capital spending.
newsitem.headline: Falcon Building sees higher capital spending.

text.p: Falcon Building Products Corp expects its capital expenditures in 1997 to be about $24.8 million, up from $20 million in 1996, the company said in its annual report.
It said the spending would be for various projects, including quality enhancement, cost improvement, regulatory compliance, efficiency improvement, increased capacity and maintenance projects.
Falcon manufactures and supplies highly engineered building products to residential, light commercial and consumer markets.
